entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] SkiaSharp crashes in WebAssembly if building with non-Release/Debug build config #101629
  • Outerloop test builds broken #101628
  • HTTP stress build is broken #101625
  • browser-Release-wasm-Mono_Release-WasmTestOnChrome fails with WebSocketException #101618
  • [wasm][firefox] crit: OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverException: Failed to decode response from marionette #101617
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Assembly.SetEntryAssembly() #101616
    9.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator Method/Interface Info/Context types should limit construction and modification #101615
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: BinaryReader.ReadExactly #101614
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting.FixedWindowRateLimiter sometimes doubles the configured rate #101612
  • [QUIC] Eliminate peer X509 certificate parsing on Linux #101602
  • System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener: System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Count cannot be less than zero. Parameter name: count #101600
  • ARM64 SVE: Zip/Unzip should use predicate variant when all inputs are masks #101598
  • [API Proposal]: DateOnly support in IsoWeek #101597
    Future
  • Improve register allocation for calls with safepoint instruction #101596
    Future
  • Array.IndexOf at string[] slower that naive implementation #101595
    Future
  • Delete UseWindowsThreadpool special casing #101591
    9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Migrate OSX build into MsQuic #101590
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Process.TryGetProcessById() #101582
  • System.IO.FileLoadException: Undefined resource string ID:0x80131621 #101581

Closed

  • [CI] Test failure from `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Cookies_Http3.GetAsync_DefaultCoookieContainer_NoCookieSent` #101567
  • [Mono] Add missing SIMD support for some methods from System.Numerics.Vector2/3/4 and Quaternion on Arm64 #91394
    9.0.0
  • [wasi][mono] Support targeting wasi in AOT compiler #82691
    9.0.0
  • RunAOTCompilation will cause calling to wasm export function throws a "uninitialized element" error #101170
    9.0.0
  • Wrong disposal of FileConfigurationSource.FileProvider by FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose() on a modification of ConfigurationManager.Sources #95745
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: What's the future of dynamic code execution, AOT, JIT and interpreter in .NET-based mobile apps? #101466
  • [wasm] `NativeLibrary` doesn't include file #96864
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] Cannot find host wasmtime #100394
    9.0.0
  • FilesystemWatcher ObjectDisposedException at the ConfigurationBuilder.Build() on the WinForms project .net8 #96212
    9.0.0
  • Support adding links to Activity after it is created #97680
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient.GetStringAsync #101601
  • [android] System.Buffers.ArrayBufferWriter running out-of-memory #101368
    9.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.Tests are timing out on s390x #101380
    Future
  • Is .net 9 going to support native AOT on WinForms? #101603
  • Add a configuration option to disable the ability for ETW to rundown symbolic state #13571
  • Blazor WASM project will not debug if index.html file includes some scripts with crossorigin #84086
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Add template options #64233
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][windows] v8 doesn't seem to exit sometimes causing helix test run to time out #64227
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] native functions with varargs are not supported #59685
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] ArchiveTests target should remove publish dir on windows #54644
    9.0.0
  • [Mono][Wasm] Pin V8 version for performance runs #45915
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    needs-area-label
  • Update build to `net9.0` images #101630
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Testing] Backport #92296 and #92901 to release/8.0-staging #101627
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable building with gcc-14 #101623
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Intrinsify SpanHelper API's #101622
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Shoring up XmlSerializer/Schema tests #101621
    area-Serialization
  • Refactor AdvSimd version of DecodeFromUTF8 #101620
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Allow moving handler regions in fgRelocateEHRegions #101613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose should dispose FileProvider when it owns it" #101610
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Fix handling of case-sensitive set loops in RegexPrefixAnalyzer.FindPrefixes #101608
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Try to reduce cost of Async #101605
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Start running S.L.Expressions trimming tests #101593
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Start running System.Runtime trimming tests #101592
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump actions/github-script from 6 to 7 #101588
    community-contribution, area-codeflow
  • Bump actions/upload-artifact from 1 to 4 #101587
    community-contribution, area-codeflow
  • Bump dotnet/actions-create-pull-request from 3 to 4 #101586
    community-contribution, area-codeflow
  • Bump actions/checkout from 2.0.0 to 4.1.4 #101585
    community-contribution, area-codeflow

Merged

  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Handle case where falseValue is contained #101515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Remove HANDLER_ENTRY_MUST_BE_IN_HOT_SECTION #101611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update link to dotnet-format tool #101619
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Improve tests/profiler/multiple/multiple.cs #101607
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Revert "FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose should dispose FileProvider when it owns it" #101609
    regression-from-last-release, area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • [mono][wasm] Include NativeLibrary items to the NativeFileReference items #101532
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasi] Separate payload directories per WorkItemPrefix #101599
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Add optimization flags to bitcode compilation #101538
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement Activity.AddLink #101381
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • Fix regression in RegexGenerator.GetSHA256FieldName #101606
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add support for Sve.UnzipEven/Odd & Sve.ZipHighLow #101294
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Reenable disabled test on s390x in ParallelForEachAsyncTests.cs #101527
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Allow preinitializing `EventSource` #101573
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Enable printing disassembly instructions under release mode for JitDisasm. #101281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Check more invariants on ABI info and fix some arm32 bugs #101372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Add some R2R missing codes. #101480
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix dependabot yml #101584
    area-Meta
  • [cdac] Read/store globals from contract descriptor #101450
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix compact time computation #100599
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Collect all `MethodDesc` fields in one place #101565
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • enable dependabot for github actions #101406
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Only warn on duplicate members within a single descriptors file #101574
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Implement greedy RPO-based block layout #101473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • With system brotli, do not use versioned symbols #101576
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101316
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • BinaryWriter perf improvements #99775
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Allow JIT to know if dynamic pgo is active #101575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement divide/multiply/subtract Math APIs #101578
    arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Add support for non-generic method instance #101442
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use bison for ilasm parser generator #101415
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Backport #89953, #91658 and #91643 to release/8.0-staging #101579
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure
  • Enable derived COM interfaces to hide base methods with the new keyword #101577
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Initial prototype for strength reduction #101431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Use common CodeGen::genHomeRegisterParams #101288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [mono] Force Mono to respect explicit struct size when LayoutKind.Sequential is used #101529
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Read EnableWriteXorExecute from runtimeConfig #101490
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add SwiftError support for Swift reverse pinvokes #101122
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static virtual calls #101491
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • Add some TODO #5213 comments #100954
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Properly disable S.L.Queryable trimming tests with AOT #101417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable interp pgo recording by default since it adds startup overhead #101566
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Simplify some non-generic CompareTo methods #101545
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm]Enable test case in aot mode #101476
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][gc] Remove reliance on regs/stack scanning in some cases #101478
    area-GC-mono
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
